overview: 16 contestants, eight men and eight women, all single, will live isolated in a tropical paradise. Here they will find love, games and money as the main protagonists of the surprising journey that awaits them. Some will go in search of true love, but others will go to have fun while developing strategies to win the grand total prize of $200,000 in cash for the winning couple, $100,000 each.
title: Por Amor o Por Dinero
